Does the activity on the meta site influence how the main site is valued?

1

The statistics on the Area 51 site only show the activity on the main site. Does the activity on the meta site (this very site) influence how the site is perceived?

I imagine that a meta site where nobody would ask about the acceptable questions, the acceptable tags, which questions to ask, or which tags to use would have a negative effect on how the main site is seen, but in which degree does the activity on the meta site influence the main site destiny?

  • support
  • meta
